extendedInfo.description: GlucoJournal is the fast, easy to use blood sugar level journaling app for diabetics or other people who need to monitor blood sugar levels. If you have diabetes, you probably realize that many factors effect how your blood sugar levels react during the day. Food, medication, exercise all play a part in blood sugar. With GlucoJournal, you can help navigate the waters of blood sugar control.GlucoJournal tracks blood sugar, blood pressure, pulse, weight, carbohydrate intake, level of exercise, as well as any medications you are taking. You can also enter notes to log any other information you like, how you're feeling, stress, etc..Most diabetics know that there is more to medication tracking than just insulin. Some medications raise sugar levels, some lower them. To make matters more complicated, time of day, proximity to meals, and interaction with other medications all play a role in maintaining healthy blood sugar levels. With GlucoJournal, you can add all you medications and dosage amounts. By logging which medications you take, in what combination, and at what time of day, GlucoJournal allows you to pinpoint just how your body processes medications.GlucoJournal is fast and easy to use. Constantly pricking your finger and testing your blood sugar is chore enough. Why wast time and experience frustration with over complicated solutions? As if your sore fingertips needed more hassle. GlucoJournal is built from the ground up to be simple. Test, record, report, you're done. Features:-Customizable entry screen-Easy to generate reports that can be emailed to your doctor-Ability to enter unlimited medications-Easily configurable-Fast and easy to use

reviews.title: Uninstalling!
reviews.comment: Did not save many of my entries. What was saved was recorded at the wrong times and often defaults to \"Before Breakfast.\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The time I posted was always wrong. I would select \"before breakfast\" and it would come up as \"bedtime.\" Happened each reading and totally not helpful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: When I entered a reading, it kept posting a totally different time, made it difficult to track my levels. Droid 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: I found this app to be simple enough but it won\'t saved the time of day you choose.  I tried adding and deleting the entries several times before it would save the actual time of day I selected.  Aside from fixing that I suggest putting the Save option on the data entry screen so you don\'t have to pull up the menu to save.  The option to edit an entry would also be helpful.
reviews.author: Lois Parker

reviews.title: A nice little App!
reviews.comment: This handy little app is quite useful for those of us with Diabetes who need to monitor blood glucose, Weight, & Blood Pressure. However, it still has some hang-ups, 1 of them being that entering a reading, such as for Weight with a decimal component (e.g. 215.5 ), and saving it, will cause the program to crash & any unsaved info. you entered, is lost. Hopefully, the programmer will fix all the glitches. It,s still a nice little App!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: No way to update previous entry, no way to customize the list of times (at wake, before breakfast, after breakfast, etc.), to delete one. No plots.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely The Best!!!
reviews.comment: I have tried all available apps for diabetic tracking and this is by far the easiest to use and has sufficient information available to track the necessary information to maintain good sugar levels. Love the note section and the ability to change medication dosage. Would love to see the ability to add food tracking, but currently I am using the note feature for that and it shows in the reports which is just fine.
reviews.author: Ti Phillips

reviews.comment: Just what i was looking for. Simple with good reports.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: App will not take and store time period (I enter \"Before breakfast, but shows up as \"Bedtime,\" over and over again-frustrating!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: fuss free, practical. deleted on treack and use this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Adds, & locked up
reviews.comment: Adds interfere with use. Locks up when I try and save a reading. Not very useful. Installed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work correctly
reviews.comment: Every entry posts as before breakfast. Even when I select at night or after lunch etc.  Kinda a waste of an app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: as you already know, always defaults to \"before breakfast.\" small annoyance otherwise helpful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sam
reviews.comment: It\'s great app. The only problem is .did not except type of meals
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Save keep force close. Xperia X10.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No way to edit mistakes on the free version???
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.comment: Cannot edit if u make a mistake, also does not give averages or charts/graphs
reviews.author: A Google User
